pullRequest.title: Refactorization of automatic rejection of applications
pullRequest.bodyText:
Created new class which now handles all functionality about application auto rejection.
Optimalized methods check only eligible vos and groups now instead of all vos and groups in Perun.

nodes.bodyText: I would suggest changing the return type of these methods to List<Integer> and moving them to the SearcherImpl component. Then you can call here the SearcherBl and map the ids to Vos.
I think this is not perunSynchronizer :)

I would add the whole part with "ignoreByAdmin" option to the else branch (or else if (Application.AppState.VERIFIED)).
The reason is this (what could happen now):
It can happen that the "ignoredByAdmin" is set to less days than "emailVerification".
Then when the application is in state NEW but the "emailVerification" did not expired yet, it will auto-reject the application with the message saying that admin did not approve the application.
However, this is not true because the application was not even in the approval process yet (it was waiting for the email verification). Therefore, it couldn't (or shouldn't) be approved.
